entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
